Articles.Content:
Was fiddling around with this model, and turns out I had a need as station Kevin was hit by debris killing 4 out of 17 crew. Rescue operation. So I through this at the problem, the moon bus from 2001 a space odessey,  it holds 10 passengers plus 2 crew.

Pictured is Gateway Kerbin II with 4 bus vehicles docked and a sat maintenance version.
